scripts.dev: pnpm run esbuild && cargo build --workspace && node postbuild.js debug && cargo run --features editor-ignore
scripts.build: pnpm run esbuild && cargo build --workspace --release --features packaged,editor-ignore --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc && node postbuild.js x86_64-pc-windows-msvc/release
scripts.package: pnpm run build && wix build ./resources/installer_script.wxs -ext WixToolset.Util.wixext -o target/glorp-setup-x86_64.msi
